title: Shortcuts
content:
## Multiline Comment

`Shift` + `Alt` + `A`

```js
 /* multiline
    comment */
```

## Singleline Comment

`Ctrl`  + `/`

```js
//
```

[Boostnote Local](https://github.com/BoostIO/BoostNote.next-local/releases/download/v0.22.3/boost-note-local-win.exe)
